Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
To learn defining a content type, create another content type named ExampleContentV2 (example-content-v2) with the resource types app as explained above. Add another element named DateTime of type OpenCmsDateTime at the second position of the <xsd:sequence> and an element named Categories of type OpenCmsDynamicCategory at the end. Further, delete the field named Image from the sequence. As an experiment, completely delete the <resourcebundles> and the <FieldSettings> elements, the resource types app did insert into the <xsd:appinfo> element.

Open the explorer, click on the wand icon, select "All" in the select box, and choose Example content V2 from the list of contents shown. This will create a new example content in the folder currently opened in the explorer.

Clicking on this file will open the form editor.

Image.Title: Form editor with example content v2 opened
